model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EasyGame, HardGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a new sudoku solution user input
    Author:
    Aleksandra, Ben, Jefferson

        Checks if all cells in board are correct

      • subtractPoints

        public void subtractPoints()
        Removes 3 times from the score. Only use if "help" button is used.

      • resetScore

        public void resetScore()
        resets score to be used for new game;

      • score

        public void score()
        When submit button is clicked, calculates the score of the game and displays it. Takes into consideration the number of times "help" was used and number of total mistakes. Also displays the time elapsed.
